esl_content: Emirati Sign Language (ESL) is the main communication method for the deaf community in the UAE, with unique signs and cultural significance. The UAE government promotes its use in education, public services, and workplaces to increase inclusivity and awareness.
needs_content: The deaf community faces challenges in employment, healthcare, and social inclusion, requiring specialized services, job opportunities, and accessible technologies. There is a need for more awareness programs, and assistive devices to support their integration into society.
support_title: UAE Government Support for the Deaf Community
support_content: The UAE government offers a range of services to the deaf community, including legal protections, inclusive education, and vocational training. It provides specialized healthcare, assistive technologies, and social services to ensure accessibility and integration. Public awareness and advocacy work to promote equality and reduce stigma for the deaf.
contribute_content: Help us expand our sign language database by submitting signs you know. Your contributions make EazyTalk better for everyone!
enter_sign: Enter the meaning of this sign
add_info: Add any additional information about this sign
review_note: Your submission will be reviewed by our team before being added to the app.
submission_thanks: Your sign has been submitted for review. Your contribution helps make communication more accessible for everyone.

esl_description: Emirati Sign Language (ESL) is the main communication method for the deaf community in the UAE, with unique signs and cultural significance. The UAE government promotes its use in education, public services, and workplaces to increase inclusivity and awareness.
needs_description: The deaf community faces challenges in employment, healthcare, and social inclusion, requiring specialized services, job opportunities, and accessible technologies. There is a need for more awareness programs, and assistive devices to support their integration into society.
uae_support: UAE Government Support for the Deaf Community
support_description: The UAE government offers a range of services to the deaf community, including legal protections, inclusive education, and vocational training. It provides specialized healthcare, assistive technologies, and social services to ensure accessibility and integration. hideaways: hideaways where fun knows no boundaries.
half_day_description: You'll see some of Dubai's most famous landmarks, take beautiful pictures and experience the great beauty of the city.
tanoura_description: Live up the classic Arabian dream on the desert safari with a delectable barbeque dinner, cultural performances to keep you entertained and a number of desert adventure to participate.
ferrari_description: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi - home to the world's fastest rollercoaster, the highest loop ride, the tallest space-frame structure ever built on the planet and over 40 record-breaking attractions. This is the ultimate destination for non-stop, hyper-adrenaline, heart-racing fun!
enter_sign_meaning: Enter the meaning of this sign
acceptance_desc: By using the Eazy Talk app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, we advise you to stop using the app.
service_desc: Eazy Talk is a platform designed to help users translate Arabic sign language to text and vice versa. It also offers features for contributing data and providing feedback to improve the platform. All functions are intended for personal, non-commercial use only.
use_only: Use the app only for its intended purpose.
avoid_upload: Avoid uploading inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content.
provide_accurate: Provide accurate information when contributing data or giving feedback.
data_desc: Users who contribute data (such as videos, images, or text labels) grant AI Signs a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use the content to improve app performance and expand its database. AI Signs will not use this data for any purpose outside its scope.
privacy_desc: Eazy Talk respects your privacy and handles your data responsibly. Data collected will only be used to improve app functionality and will not be shared with third parties without your consent. For more details, please review our privacy policy.
liability_desc: Eazy Talk is provided 'as is'. While we strive to ensure accurate translations and smooth functionality, we do not guarantee the app's performance at all times. AI Signs will not be liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use or inability to use the app.
updates_desc: Eazy Talk reserves the right to modify these terms and app features at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes through the app or other communication channels.
contact_desc:
If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding these terms or the app, please contact us at: 
Email: Ammaralhawamdeh@gmail.com 
Phone: 0567132854

zayed_org: Zayed Higher Organization for People of Determination
zayed_org_desc: Provides comprehensive educational programs tailored for deaf students with focus on bilingual education using Emirati Sign Language and Arabic.
sharjah_city_desc: Offers specialized courses for deaf students of all ages, including vocational training and integration programs with sign language support.
al_amal: Al Amal School for the Deaf
al_amal_desc: One of the oldest specialized schools for deaf students in the UAE, offering academic curriculum delivered in sign language from kindergarten through high school.
emirates_assoc_desc: Provides sign language courses, interpreter training, and regular workshops to support education and employment for the deaf community.
